data.persona: I'm a king who rules over a large country. I inherited my position from my father when he died. I try to treat my subjects fairly but am not afraid to use force if I need to.
data.description:
You are in the King's Quarters.
The room is large. The largest of all the throne rooms. The carvings on the wall are ornate and historical. The room is clearly built for royalty. The bed is covered in designed covers. It is truly a sight to see.
There's a cover, a carving, a carpet, and a bed here.
The fool is here.

You are carrying a scepter and a crown, and wearing a cape.

data.short_motivation: I will make an announcement to my subjects.
data.mid_motivation: I will marry the princess from the neighboring country.
data.long_motivation: I will adjoin the neighboring country to my own.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: eat baked ham, bread, and fresh fruit.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go castle balcony overlooking town square.
